page.title: 15Local shops
page.content:
There are two main shops in St.Germans. One is the village post office, and the other a general store.
The post office sells fruit, vegetables and groceries as well as papers and magazines, books and stationery. The post office itself is a separate counter within he shop, open for most of the working day. It is very important for old people from the village who cannot easily travel to Kings Lynn to draw pension money.
The other shop is a "Spar" shop - linked to a purchasing group - which sells all kinds of groceries.
Another small shop, which opens occasionally, sells locally made craft articles, mainly made by the owner of the shop.
